```{r}
library(readr)
getwd()
suppressMessages(Shakespeare <- read_csv("Shakespeare.csv"))

```

```{r}
library(treemap)
treemap(Shakespeare,
        index=(c("Play_ID")),
        vSize="nLines")
```

```{r,message=F}
library(dplyr)
Shakespeare %>% 
  group_by(Play_ID) %>% 
  summarise(s = sum(nLines)) %>% 
  arrange(desc(s))
```


```{r}
library(sunburstR)
str2 = Shakespeare %>% 
  mutate(str = paste0("Type:",Type,"-","Play:",Play_ID,"-","Character:",Character_ID)) %>% 
  select(str, nLines)
sunburst(str2)
```
